page.title: 15The Dentist - Purley
page.content: My dentist is in Purley and I visit him every four months. If I need a filling or have a tooth out he gives me an injection in my gum so that there will be no pain. For a filling he drills a hole in my tooth then a lady sucks up all the little bits in my mouth with a tiny hoover and finally the filling stuff is pushed into the hole. The whole thing takes about twenty minutes and sometimes it hurts a bit. Another part of dental treatment is fluoride treatment. This is a substance which is put on children's teeth by the Dental Hygienist to keep them free from decay. My parents do not have to pay for my visits to the dentist because I am a child and I get it on the National Health Service.
